nodes.bodyText: Redundant. I think we should remove one of those, or we could approach it with a regular expression.

@@ -0,0 +1,17 @@
+name: PR Labeler
+on:
+  pull_request:
+    types: [opened]
+
+jobs:
+  pr-labeler:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
